overview: In this sequel to the wildly successful Groupies: Phil Varone continues on his U.S. tour playing drums for Saigon Kick, giving viewers an all access pass to the secret world of Rock and Roll. From back stage to hotel rooms, this uncensored series only proves that anything you've seen or heard about this life is not only true, but almost unbelievable!
tagline: Real Groupies, Real Sex, Real Hot
title: 100% Real Groupies 2: The Mayhem Continues
